textMarkdown.html:
An Italian working group comprising the Italian Association of Medical Oncology (AIOM) and the Italian Society of Pharmacology (SIF) has published recommendations for the use of UGT1A1*28 (TA7 repeats) genotype when prescribing irinotecan. In particular, the analysis of the UGT1A1 (TA)n polymorphism rs3064744, in the promoter region, is advisable:

  • BEFORE treatment to prevent severe adverse reactions, if the medical oncologist consider it appropriate on the basis of the clinical condition of the patient (comorbidity, performance status PS and tumor stage) and of the benefit-risk ratio;
  • DURING treatment, in case of grade â‰¥3 gastrointestinal toxicities and/or grade 4 (NCI-CTCAE v.4.0) hematologic toxicities, and anyway in all cases of severe unexpected toxicities.
